responses: To drive on the race track , Yes...for courses like drift and kids activities no need.
Any age as long as you reach the pedals (140cm), to drive on the race track we only ask for driving license which mean in the US is 16, other countries 17 and in Europe 18.
As passengers from 3 year old, as drivers from 10/11 depend on their height (140cm min)
As many as you want, consider 10 laps max in each session ( we have 8/10 sessions a day)
No, there are only 2 seats in the Ferrari for the driver and instructor. If your partner can not drive we can take them for a fast lap.
You must do the booking and payment from the product page BEFORE coming to the race track. we can not accept credit cards on site. Cars must be prepared for you so we need to know you are coming.
In Milan , we run almost every day from 09.00 till 16.00 in the summer also till 19.00. Best days to arrive are: Sunday, Monday, Thursday and Friday. We do not run on Saturday.
